attributes.action: Introduce politics to the secondary curriculum
attributes.background: As a sixth form student, I have met many 18 years olds who didn't vote because they didn't understand politics. It is important young people are taught about politics as it develops their understanding of current events in Britain and the world, helping them form their own opinions of the parties.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104426

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
